author: Emily Van de Riet
title: Taylor Swift confirms â€˜Fortnightâ€™ with Post Malone will be first single from new album
text: (Gray News) â€“ Taylor Swift confirmed that the first single from her new album â€œThe Tortured Poets Departmentâ€ will be her collaboration with Post Malone titled â€œFortnight.â€ In an Instagram post Thursday afternoon, Swift announced the single, saying that she has â€œbeen such a huge fan of Post because of the writer he is, his musical experimentation and those melodies he creates that just stick in your head forever.â€ She continued, â€œI got to witness that magic come to life firsthand when we worked together on â€˜Fortnight.â€™â€ â€œFortnightâ€ is listed as track No. 1 on â€œThe Tortured Poets Department.â€ Swift also announced that the music video for â€œFortnightâ€ will premiere Friday at 8 p.m. ET. Fans will be able to hear the song for the first time when the entirety of â€œThe Tortured Poets Departmentâ€ releases Friday at 12 a.m. ET. Swift did not release any songs on the album prior to its release, leaving fans guessing what the new music will sound like. The highly anticipated â€œThe Tortured Poets Departmentâ€ is Swiftâ€™s eleventh studio album. Copyright 2024 Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: TN National Desk
title: 'Turning Into Dubai': Memes Flood X As Dust Storm Engulfs Delhi-NCR | Times Now
text: New Delhi: The National Capital Territory of Delhi and its adjoining areas witnessed a massive dust storm on Friday night, with gusty winds of up to 50-70 Km/h windspeeds occurring over the entire NCR. Loni Dehat, Hindon AF Station, Ghaziabad, Indirapuram, Chhapraula, Noida, Dadri, Greater Noida, Gurugram, Faridabad, Manesar, Ballabhgarh, Gohana, Gannaur, Sonipat, Rohtak, Kharkhoda (Haryana) Baraut, Bagpat, Khekra (UP), were among the areas affected.As per the Met Department, light intensity rain/drizzle is expected over and adjoining areas of Kaithal, Narwana, Rajaund, Assandh, Safidon, Barwala, Jind, Hissar, Hansi, Siwani, Meham, Tosham (Haryana) during next 2 hours.As the winds hit the region, users stormed the social media with funny memes over sudden change of weather in Delhi.One of the users said, \"NCR turned into Dubai\", while another posted a photo of Akshay Kumar and Johnny Lever covered in dust saying ,\"Delhi & NCRS PEOPLE\". \"Delhi NCR right now,\" an X user said while sharing photo of the popular doge coin dog in a form of a massive storm.\"Baat maan bhai yeh photo Dilli ka hai!\" said another posting a photo of a desert as dust storm engulfed Delhi.\"Looks like Avengers are finally arriving ğŸ›¬ in India,\" a user posted.The strong winds led to stalled traffic in the city and flight diversions to nearby airports.As the dust storm hits Delhi-NCR and surrounding regions, authorities warn of potential repercussions on various fronts. Strong winds accompanying the storm pose risks to agriculture, with potential damage to plantation, horticulture, and standing crops anticipated.Additionally, vulnerable structures may experience partial damage due to the force of the winds, while kutcha houses, walls, and huts are at risk of minor damage. Loose objects may become airborne, heightening the potential for harm.In light of these warnings, authorities advise residents to take precautionary measures. It is recommended to stay indoors, close windows and doors, and refrain from unnecessary travel if feasible. Seeking safe shelters is advised, with individuals urged not to take refuge under trees due to the risks posed by falling branches or debris.As the region braces for the approaching dust storm, residents are encouraged to remain vigilant and adhere to safety guidelines to mitigate potential risks to life and property.

author: RNZ News
title: Thunderstorm can't deny Black Caps series saving win
text:
New Zealand have won the third and final T20 cricket international against Bangladesh despite the intervention of a thunderstorm at Mount Maunganui.
The Black Caps went into the match needing to win the game to draw the three match series, while Bangladesh were chasing their first T20 series win in New Zealand.
New Zealand skipper Mitch Santner won the toss and opted to bowl and the wickets soon began began tumbling as the Bangladesh batters struggled to post a seemingly competitive total.
Skipper Najmul Shanto with 17 top scored, as the tourists limped through to 110 all out.
Santner was the most successful of the Black Caps bowlers taking 4-16, while Ben Sears, Tim Southee and Adam Milne took two wickets apiece.
While the 111 run target appeared meager, New Zealand made hard work of the run chase slumping to 38 for four.
Tim Seifert, Daryl Mitchell, Glen Phillips and Mark Chapman could all only make one run each with Chapman run out after a horrible mix up with Finn Allen, when the pair collided mid-pitch and Chapman was unable to scramble home.
When Finn Allen went for 38 the Black Caps were 49 for five.
Jimmy Neesham and Santer then teamed up to steady the ship putting on an unbeaten stand of 46 for the sixth wicket before the rain, thunder and lightening arrived forcing the players off and with New Zealand 95-5 in the 15th over.
That total had New Zealand ahead under DLS with the par score being 78, giving the home side a 17 run victory, when the umpires eventually called the game off, leaving the series drawn at 1-all.
Game two on Friday night at Bay Oval was washed out.

author: Emily Arnold
title: Unique program helping employ those with disabilities
text: Unique program helping employ those with disabilities MISHAWAKA, Ind. -- A unique program is helping pave opportunities for those with disabilities in our community. Corvilla is a non-profit organization that offers residential, day and employment services to its clients. Part of the employment services includes a program with StudioFive9, where clients get to create artwork that they can then sell and profit off of. It gives them a chance to earn a paycheck for something they're passionate about doing. Clients can also find employment with one of Corvilla's partner businesses, like Martin's or Meijer. The Corvilla site in Mishawaka also features a showroom, with lots of unique, hand-crafted furniture for sale that the clients helped create. All of the money earned from sales goes right back to the Corvilla artist who made it. If you'd like to learn more about Corvilla's services, [head to their website!](https://www.corvilla.org/services) To view client art on sale, head to [Studio Five9's website](https://www.studiofive9.com/). You can also make purchases directly from the Corvilla site in Mishawaka, or the Kroc Center in South Bend! To donate towards Corvilla and help support the work they're doing for the local special needs population, [visit this website.](https://corvillainc-bloom.kindful.com/)
